channel.title: Compiler isnt working
channel.description: my compiler isnt working. it says "system cant find specified path" (i got it in norwegian so it may be a bad translation) do i have to do anything, change anything or find a new one?

item.title: Compiler isnt working
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“im in a server, post:3, topic:414664”]it doesn’t say anything like tht…

it says :

[quote]@echo off
cd src
javac -d …/bin *.java
pause[/quote][/quote]
Try…

@echo off cd src javac -cp -d ../src *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler isnt working
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“im in a server, post:1, topic:414664”]my compiler isnt working. it says “system cant find specified path” (i got it in norwegian so it may be a bad translation)
do i have to do anything, change anything or find a new one?
[/quote]
right click edit on your compiler then there should be something like
c:/…/6_… there’s a number like 12 or 18 change that to the jdk version that you have.
If you don’t have a jdk version installed install one.

Read full topic
